Hello,
This may be an odd question but between Nobunaga, Hideyoshi and Iey=
asu,
who would you consider the better daimyo and why? This may include
gen=
ius in warefare, administration or simply how successful they were. 
I know=
 Ieyasu was the eventual unifier of Japan but is that simply
because of his=
 superiority over the other two leaders or because of
their unfortunate cir=
cumstances, i.e. Nobunaga dying untimely at the
hands of his vassal and Hid=
eyoshi having no family name or title able to
be passed on etc? Likewise ho=
w much was Ieyasu's success in creating the
Tokugawa Shogunate owed to the =
previous two sengoku jidai leaders?

Charlie Carroll
